text: Sano chilandanyo cha ŵandu ŵaakutolaga ipanje yao pakusachilila chinonyelo cha Allah, ni kusimichisya kwakutyochela m’mitima mwao (kuti Allah chachalipila), chili chisawu n'gunda wauli pa chiŵata chakunyakuchila nikumputila wula jejinji nikoposya isogosi yakwe mwa chitupyo chakusogola kaŵili, nambo naga ngamputila wula jejinji, nikuti jamawawa (jikunkwanagape nikusogola mujikusogolelaga migunda jine). Sano Allah ichindu yankutenda aŵele Jwakuilolechesya
